Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the PC12/TetOn cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Alpha-synuclein (A30P) showed a slight increase in toxicity when macroautophagy was inhibited, but no aggregation was observed.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent Western blot experiments were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type alpha-synuclein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA followed by Tukey’s post-hoc test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Alpha-synuclein expression level similar to baseline conditions.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significant increase in alpha-synuclein expression and/or formation of aggregates.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the PC12/TetOn cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Alpha-synuclein (A30P) showed increased toxicity when macroautophagy was inhibited, leading to cell death.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent MTT assays were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type alpha-synuclein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA followed by Tukey’s post-hoc test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell viability similar to baseline conditions.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the PC12/TetOn cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: No aggregation of alpha-synuclein (A30P) was observed under immunocytochemistry.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent immunocytochemistry experiments were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type alpha-synuclein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.
